title: "Duke Retirees and Alumni Keep Learning With OLLI"
excerpt: "Her course on “A Century of Medical Miracles” is among more than 200 offered annually by the Osher Lifelong Learning Institute at Duke. Established in 1977, “OLLI at Duke” has more than 1,900 members who take classes and participate in educational and social activities ranging from book clubs to gatherings with Duke undergraduates."
